properties.areaDesc: Bibb, AL; Jefferson, AL; Shelby, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 6:39AM CST until February 7 at 7:56PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Cahaba River Near Cahaba Heights Affecting Bibb...Jefferson and
Shelby Counties.

.Heavy rainfall is producing rises on the Cahaba River at Cahaba
Heights and a flood warning is now in effect.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Cahaba River Near Cahaba Heights.
* until Friday evening...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 6:30 AM Thursday The stage Was 13.6 feet.
* Flood stage is 14 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...rise above flood stage by this morning and continue to
rise to near 17.3 feet by after midnight tonight. The river will
fall below flood stage by tomorrow morning.
* Impact...At 17 feet...Flooding of some commercial property in the
area begins as stages continues to rise.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Friday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
